r.s: This is the official PHP Extension to connect to CUBRID Database.
r.d: CUBRID is an open source database management system highly optimized for Web applications (http://www.cubrid.org). The current PHP extension is fully compatibly with the latest stable version of CUBRID Database. To post issues and report bugs, please use CUBRID Official Forum at http://forum.cubrid.org.
r.n: Fixed bugs: [APIS-756] crashed (core dumped) in calling cubrid_pconnect in PHP 7.1.x version
